## Description and Rationale

We’re a team of aviation and machine-learning researchers from Argonne National Lab. Propulsion, controls, data science, optimization—if it flies or fits a gradient, we’re on it. Let’s see how far we can go before we hit the ceiling.

## Details

* Type: Academia, Government
* Country: United States
